sections.summary: management experience and a desire to work for the best skilled management professional eager to contribute expertise, strong personnel development skills, and communication talents toward actively supporting an organization in maximizing performance. highlights client relations specialist high customer service standards team management employee relations specialist focused on customer satisfaction call center management experience training and development strong problem solving ability deadline-oriented customer service management expertise customer relationship management software (crm) accomplishments exceeded corporate target for customer satisfaction for 4 months in a row.
